column2: My liege needs entertainment [GetJesterOccasion], what should I plan?
[From.GetFirstName] told me a story to entertain me [From.GetJesterOccasion]. [From.GetJesterStory] [From.GetJesterStoryResult]
I have other things to do.
I can't wait for your next show, [From.GetFirstName]!
[From.GetTitledName] was so furious with the mockery I targeted [From.GetHerHim] with, that [From.GetSheHe] imprisoned me !.
I made a complete fool of myself after I did my [GetJesterChoice], and not in a good way! I undoubtedly embarrassed [From.GetTitledName]...
[From.GetTitledName] was unsatisfied with my performance. I need to work on my [GetJesterChoice].
I had little reaction from [From.GetTitledName]. I thought [GetJesterChoice] was something I was at least satisfactory at. Maybe [From.GetSheHe] liked it...?
[From.GetTitledName] had good laughs and congratulated me on my act. I am better than I thought at [GetJesterChoice]!
[From.GetTitledName] was smiling almost constantly, thanks to me! I'm truly competent at [GetJesterChoice]!
I hope I brightened his day!
